title: Goodbye Clutter, Hello Simplicity
description: THE LATEST REVISED AND EXPANDED EDITION IS NOW AVAILABLE IN PAPERBACK! Do you have clutter and feel overwhelmed because you don't know where to start? Are you keeping things because you feel you might need them someday? Do you have disorganized areas in your home? Stop losing valuable time from your life and let go of the unused and unloved things once and for all. Organize your home and keep it that way – forever. This guide will walk you through the maze of sorting through clutter with simple step-by-step solutions that will motivate and teach you how • Overcome sentimental attachment to things * Sort through everything – from piles of paper to a basement packed with stuff * Ask yourself effective questions while sorting • Curb the urge to shop * Decide what stays and what goes • Organize everything from your coat closet to your car and so much more! • …and so much more! Think of clutter-clearing as a guided treasure hunt to finding your most favorite possessions. Begin the journey to simplify your life. Let's get started - you'll have me cheering you on, every step of the way!
author: Krissy Falzon
